name: Wandering Duelist
description:
The Wandering Duelist is a single-player, narrative-driven adventure game that tells a story of love, conflict and reckless actions.

Youth is a crucial stage in life when events and experiences shape who we are today, and you will have to make a decision that affect your transition to adulthood.
The player explores a small and lively planet, where residents perform their daily tasks while often acting as obstacles and dangers.
